title: How to translate something from Urdu to English - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, there is multiple online translation platforms/website who can translate your content or document from English to Urdu and many other languages like Tamil, Marathi, Gujarati, Assamese, Spanish, German etc or vice versa also if you needed. But, from my experience I would like to recommend you THE MIGRATION TRANSLATORS They have the best language translators on the organization for any language. All are accredited by the National Accreditation Authority for Translators and Interpreters Ltd. (NAATI). They have a team of multilingual translators are always ready to assist you and fulfill your language needs. They provide high-quality translation for different types of documents, websites and varied marketing collateral's at the fastest turnaround time. They have a pool of experienced, professional translators who are bilingual native speakers of the target language and ensure the accuracy of the translations. They provide free and instant quotes and gives professional translation services 24/7. They have certified translators in different languages who work on small and large projects in different fields. You just only want to choose the languages and upload your document for translation. Once you have made your application submitted, I can assure you that the result will be best and satisfactory.  I had a great experience with them because they're very flexible, very fast in responding to our queries and provided us with great support (both technical and practical).

If it’s a document (file), it’s probably easier to use MateCat (www.matecat.com): Select language pair (Urdu > English)Upload your documentClick on Analyse and, in the new page, on Translate once the analysis is finishedOpen the link on the top to translate it yourselfIn the page that opens up, you have the option to go through each sentence and improve the translation or to download a Preview of your document, which basically is a translation done with Google Translate and human contributions. Alessandro
In order to translate from Urdu to English you need to have a good vocabulary, and if you want to improve your vocabulary you need to read as many answers as you can on Quora.

Hello, You must be having the in depth knowledge of both the languages to translate Urdu into English or vice-versa. If you really looking to translate something specific, I would surely love to help you.
